channel.title: Resources on ...Down the Rabbit Hole...
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on ...Down the Rabbit Hole...

item.title: Resources for getting started in a world of open-source software
item.description: This is a list of resources that I’ve found useful to combine as a handout for students (from teaching a range of different courses). You can download the list in pdf form here if you like printing documents to read later. I’m currently in the process of adding this material as an online post, so check back often!

item.title: Considering Poster Design and Presentation
item.description: This is just a small comment piece I put together on [my] ideas behind the philosophy of design and scientific posters. It also includes quite a few links to sites and blogs that I have found useful and have got a lot of inspiration from. You can download these in pdf form here if you like printing documents to read later. I’m currently in the process of adding this material as an online post, so check back often!
